snippet.title: Arctic Awakening | Gameplay Trailer | Future Games Show June 2022
snippet.description:
The Future Game Show 2022 is proud to present this gameplay trailer for Arctic Awakening. Arctic Awakening follows a pilot who crash lands in the arctic after his plane is chopped in half by mysterious forces. He also has a court-mandated therapy robot called Alfie. 

Arctic Awakening, which is coming to PC, Mac and consoles in 2023.

Our Socials - YouTube: www.youtube.com/GamesRadar
Twitter: www.twitter.com/FutureGamesShow
Facebook: www.facebook.com.GamesRadar
Twitch: www.twitch.tv/GamesRadar
